defs: a magical mark on the forehead of a person which is supposed to bring him or her under a spell; a bewitching mark.
the tip of the flame of a magical lamp that is supposed to bring a person under a spell.
any of the herbs used to bring a person under a spell.
= ವಶ್ಯಮೂಲಿಕೆ.
a speaker who has the power to keep his audience spellbound; a man who sways an audience with eloquence.

a trancelike condition usu. induced by another person, in which the subject is in a state of altered consciousness and responds, with certain limitations, to the suggestions of the hypnotist; hypnosis.
an ointment supposed to have magical power to bring a person under a spell.
a mystical word or words, magical syllables used to cast a spell on others.
a woman who is spellbound, bewitched.
an exclamation uttered by the main priest in a sarifice, on hearing of which the sacrificer casts the oblations offered to the deity into the fire.
(fig.) a scolding in abusive language.
an oblation offered to a deity in a sacrifice, when the main priest utters a particular exclamation.

excessive frequency and looseness of bowel movements; diarrhea.
an acute, highly contagious virus disease characterised by prolonged fever, vomiting, and pustular eruptions that often leave pitted scars or pockmarks, when healed; small pox.
